data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=E290lmufiyIQ7kNvgFUAW1d&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYB-aQEv7wxqjlRGyep6UK1iLxKmxGvLHxvuJXHLlSWflA&oe=66DC3737)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=THaPUkiZRtYQ7kNvgGTkVtb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYANl1i2Wcs2lYviLR7bluLnhPLjA4xYVAn3AatuUVQ44Q&oe=66DC44D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=40Nh9-jqaDUQ7kNvgEYEalx&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYChNnBM4S0y_hTwcwD0Qp3E5CF2u0k1dRYj-EiQO85BdQ&oe=66DC3009)
